item.title: CICD tools overview
item.description: Name Description Jenkins Jenkins automation server Tekton A K8s-native Pipeline resource drone Drone is a Container-Native, Continuous Delivery Platform JX Jenkins X provides automated CI+CD for Kubernetes with Preview Environments on Pull Requests using Tekton, Knative, Prow, Skaffold and Helm Fundation CD Fundation is a Neutral Home for the Next Generation of Continuous Delivery Collaboration
